statements: SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprintData
SELECT id, carbon_emissions, location, date FROM CarbonFootprintData
SELECT id, location, carbon_emissions, date FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE carbon_emissions > 100
SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT location, SUM(carbon_emissions) AS total_emissions FROM CarbonFootprintData GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(carbon_emissions) AS total_emissions FROM CarbonFootprintData GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_emissions DESC;
SELECT id, location, carbon_emissions FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(carbon_emissions) AS avg_emissions FROM CarbonFootprintData;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM CarbonFootprintData GROUP BY location HAVING num_records > 3;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data
SELECT id, date, location, carbon_emissions FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_emissions > 100
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location, SUM(carbon_emissions) AS total_emissions FROM carbon_footprint_data GROUP BY location
SELECT id, location, carbon_emissions, date FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, carbon_emissions FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_emissions > 100 ORDER BY carbon_emissions DESC;
SELECT AVG(carbon_emissions), location FROM carbon_footprint_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, SUM(carbon_emissions) AS total_emissions FROM carbon_footprint_data GROUP BY location HAVING total_emissions > 500;
SELECT e.method, cr.emission_saved, cr.date FROM carbon_footprint_data cr JOIN emission_reduction e ON cr.id = e.id ORDER BY cr.date ASC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data;
SELECT item_name, carbon_emissions FROM carbon_footprint_data ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT id, source_name, carbon_intensity FROM emission_sources WHERE carbon_intensity > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM emission_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT company_name, SUM(emissions_total) AS total_emissions FROM emission_reports GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY total_emissions DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_emissions > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, carbon_emissions FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_emissions < 5 AND item_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY carbon_emissions ASC;
SELECT item_name, carbon_emissions FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_emissions BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY carbon_emissions DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT item_name, carbon_emissions FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE item_name IN ('Paper', 'Plastic', 'Metal') ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, carbon_emissions FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE item_name LIKE '%b%' AND carbon_emissions > 0 ORDER BY carbon_emissions ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, category, value FROM carbon_footprint WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY id;
SELECT source_name, emission_factor FROM emissions_sources ORDER BY emission_factor ASC;
SELECT date, emissions_total FROM emissions_reports WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT strategy, reduction_amount FROM emission_reduction ORDER BY reduction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint WHERE category = 'Transport' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT source_name, emission_factor FROM emissions_sources WHERE emission_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT location, emissions_total FROM emissions_reports WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY emissions_total DESC;
SELECT strategy, reduction_amount FROM emission_reduction WHERE reduction_amount < 100 ORDER BY date ASC, strategy DESC;
SELECT category, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM carbon_footprint GROUP BY category ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT id, emission_type, emission_value FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_value > 1000;
SELECT location, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emissions FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM emissions_sources ORDER BY source_type DESC, emission_factor ASC;
SELECT id, target_name, target_date FROM emissions_targets WHERE target_value < 5000 ORDER BY target_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_type='CO2' ORDER BY emission_value DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(emission_value) FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY location;
SELECT source_name, emission_factor FROM emissions_sources WHERE source_type='Industrial' ORDER BY emission_factor ASC;
SELECT * FROM emission_reduction WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY reduction_amount DESC;
SELECT target_name, target_date FROM emissions_targets WHERE target_value > 500 ORDER BY target_date ASC;
